about_the_game:
The "HOME" series is a miniature word game based on different native family backgrounds. "HOME: Mother" is the first work in the series, telling a gentle emotional shackles. Every time the protagonist returns home, he seems to forget something important. He rummaged through the items in his home, trying to find important things that were missing from his memory.

Game features

Light puzzle solving
Solving puzzles is not the focus, but it is not easy either. All answers are hidden in the protagonist's memories. Pay attention to all possibilities and be careful of information traps.

Hidden items
They can be very subtle, which means you may need to be patient, although your most loyal friends will always drop enough hints for you.

Verbal reasoning
Everything is hidden in memories, but memories are incomplete. You need to find the secret that happened to the protagonist and restore the entire story. But if it all ends, does the truth mean anything?
